availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Turner Stallins (Caldwell co, ky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Filed a marriage bond to Paulina Egbert Stallins in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on September 28, 1852. Father of G. W. Stallins, M. L. Stallins, W. J. Stallins, and S. P. Stallins. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 352B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Bucksnort, p. 417A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p. 5.
"William Turner Stallins (1831-1918)," Find A Grav, Memorial #19279785, accessed June 2, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/19279785.
